name: Micro Mayhem
description: Local multiplayer game: challenge your friends, lots of fun guaranteed! 6 game modes, 3 vehicles and 18 different maps.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Inter Core i5-3550 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760 | AMD R7 265 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4600 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 | AMD R9 280 Storage: 5 GB available space
